name: AMQ - Air and Dusk
description:
an Air background and a dusk-inspired colorscheme for https://animemusicquiz.com
Enjoy it more looking at what you love.
Non-transparent version of https://userstyles.org/styles/172559/amq-air-and-dusk-transparent
additional_info:

Feel free to add/edit/contribute styles!
Report bugs through GitHub or Discord
Want to contribute or make your own?
